post: SELECT * FROM empty_poll WHERE idempty_poll = ? AND erased = FALSE
SELECT * FROM question_group WHERE name = ? AND description = ? AND erased = FALSE
get: SELECT DISTINCT   qg.idquestion_group AS 'idQuestionGroup', qg.idempty_poll AS 'idEmptyPoll', qg.name AS 'group', qg.description AS 'groupDescription' FROM question_group qg INNER JOIN empty_poll ep ON ep.idempty_poll = qg.idempty_poll WHERE qg.idempty_poll = ? AND qg.erased = FALSE;
getId: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM question_group WHERE idquestion_group = ? AND erased = FALSE
put: UPDATE question_group SET ? WHERE idquestion_group = ? AND erased = FALSE
delete: UPDATE question_group SET ERASED = TRUE WHERE idquestion_group = ? AND erased = FALSE
